full_summary:
# Invitation to Tender: Roof Replacement for A1 and B5 Buildings at Dorchester Penitentiary

## Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified suppliers to submit a tender for the roof replacement of buildings A1 and B5 at the Dorchester Penitentiary, located in New Brunswick.

## Tender Information

* **Reference Number**: WS3849428668-Doc3880074420
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3849428668
* **Publication Date**: 2023-02-20
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-03-07T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-03-17
* **Expected Contract End Date**: No end date has been provided

## Procurement Method
This tender will be awarded through a Competitive - Selective tendering method, where the lowest price will be used as the selection criterion.

## Goods and Services
The procurement involves roofing and siding and sheet metal services as per the UNSPSC code 72152600.

## Regions
The contract will be executed in New Brunswick.

## Trade Agreement
This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Contact Information
For any inquiries related to this tender, please contact Edward Johnston at edward.johnston@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

## Important Dates
Please note that the tender closing date is fixed, and no requests for clarification will be entertained after this date.
